Text: Fwd PGE K Final DraftFYI were having problems with the EnronPGE Gateway so Im sending these again via the Internet Hope these get to you soon Inline attachment follows From To Metts Mark OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNMMETTS Bob Butts DOUGLAS NICHOLS JAY DUDLEY Jim Piro MACK SHIVELY Mark Koenig Pamela Lesh Paul Kaufman Robert Eickenroht William Valach CC Jim Warberg Steven G JOHNSON Tony Gin Date Tuesday October GMT Subject Attached for your final review is PGEs Form K which we plan to file with the SEC tomorrow Wednesday Oct th The document incorporates suggested comments received from Enron Legal and Regulatory Departments Enrons NW Natural Sale Deal Team PGEs Bond Counsel VE Arthur Andersen Audit Team and PGEs Legal Rates and Finance Departments Please provide me any final comments you have no later than pm today Jim Piro will be getting our final version to Mark Dodson NW Natural to allow a quick review of our proposed filing Thanks again for all your assistance with this filing Kirk Stevens mailto
